references.paper_title: Contextual bandit learning with predictable rewards
references.reason: This paper lays the groundwork for contextual bandit learning, a crucial subfield influencing the IGL algorithms explored in the main paper.

references.paper_title: Beyond UCB: Optimal and efficient contextual bandits with regression oracles
references.reason: This paper provides advanced contextual bandit algorithms, particularly the inverse-gap weighting strategy used in the on-policy IGL algorithm.
This paper introduces Interaction-Grounded Learning (IGL), the central concept that the main paper expands upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Personalized reward learning with interaction-grounded learning (IGL)
references.reason: This paper directly addresses personalized rewards within IGL, a key problem tackled by the main paper's proposed algorithms.
This widely cited textbook on reinforcement learning provides foundational context and background to the field, informing the IGL work.
